Kloofhill Caring (NPO No. 002-528) is a community-focused non-profit organisation dedicated to improving lives through care, compassion, and practical support.

What We Do
We hire out high-quality nursing equipment and provide expert advice to assist individuals and families in need of home-based care. In addition to our services, we actively support and donate to local charities, extending our reach beyond the immediate community.

Operating Hours
We’re open on weekdays from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM, offering friendly, personalised assistance to anyone who visits.

️Staff
Our caring staff members are always ready to help with guidance, equipment needs, or general advice.
